item.description:
11am. Find your best green attire, keep your eyes open for leprechauns, and join in the revelry to celebrate St. Patrick's Day in Newport! The parade begins at 11 a.m. at City Hall, runs through Washington Square, down Thames Street, and ends at St. Augustine's Church. Please feel free to invite any friends, neighbors, relatives or colleagues; the more the merrier!

Check out Busker's website: http://www.buskerspub...
item.name: St. Patricks Day
